cookie_notice: Note: This website uses cookies to persist the settings.
please_use_other_name_color: Please use another name or color
guide_shoot_mobile: Tap on the shoot button to shoot.
guide_move_mobile: Tap on the buttons in the bottom left corner to move.
guide_move_desktop: Move using the arrow keys or WASD.
guide_aim_mobile: To aim, tap on the screen and drag your finger to the desired direction.
guide_aim_desktop: To aim, move the cursor to the desired direction.
guide_select_bullet: You can iterate through the available bullets by tapping on the arrow buttons beside the current bullet or by scrolling with your mouse.
